Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:

2 enakku Sugandhavaasanaiyaaga, Thaganapaligalukku Aduththa Kaanikkaiyaiyum Appaththaiyum, Kuriththakaalaththil Enakku Seluththumpadikkuk Gavanamaayirukkakkadaveergal Endru Nee Isravel Puththirarukkuk Kattalaiyidu.

3 melum Nee Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Karththarukku Seluththavendiya Thaganapali Ennavendraal: Niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Naadorum Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Irandu Aattukkuttigalaip Paliyidavendum.
4 kaalaiyil Oru Aattukkuttiyaiyum, Maalaiyil Oru Aattukkuttiyaiyum Paliyittu,
5 pojanapaliyaaga Oru Marakkaalile Paththil Oru Pangaanadhum Idiththup Pizhindha Kaarpadi Enneyile Pisaindhadhumaagiya Melliya Maavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
6 idhu Seenaai Malaiyile Kattalaiyidappatta Niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapali; Idhu Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaikkaana Thaganapali.
7 kaarpadi Dhraatcharasam Oru Aattukkuttikku Aduththa Paanapali; Parisuththa Sthalaththilekarththarukku Andha Rasam Paanapaliyaaga Vaarkkappadakkadavadhu.
8 kaalaiyin Pojanapalikkum Adhin Paanapalikkum Oppaagave Maalaiyil Matra Aattukkuttiyaiyum Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapaliyaaga Seluththakkadaveergal.

9 oivunaalilo Pojanapalikkaaga Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Irandu Aattukkuttigalaiyum, Paththil Irandu Pangaanadhum Enneyile Pisaindhadhumaana Melliya Maavaiyum, Adhin Paanapaliyaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
10 niththamum Seluththum Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyum Adhin Paanapaliyum Andri Ovvoru Oivunaalilum Indha Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyum Seluththappadavendum.
11 ungal Maadhappirappugalil Neengal Karththarukku Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Irandu Kaalaigalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Ezhu Aattukkuttigalaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.

12 pojanapaliyaaga Ovvoru Kaalaikkup Paththil Moondrupangaanadhum Enneyile Pisaindhadhumaana Melliya Maavaiyum, Pojanapaliyaaga Oru Aattukkadaavukkup Paththil Irandu Pangaanadhum Enneyile Pisaindhadhumaana Maavaiyum,
13 pojanapaliyaaga Ovvoru Aattukkuttikkup Paththil Oru Pangaanadhum Enneyile Pisaindhadhumaana Maavaiyum Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Seluththakkadaveergal.

14 avaigalukketra Paanapaligal Dhraatcharasaththil Kaalaikku Araippadiyum, Aattukkadaavukkup Padiyil Moondril Oru Pangum, Aattukkuttikkuk Kaarpadi Rasamumaayirukkavendum; Idhu Varusha Muzhuvadhum Maadhanthorum Seluththappadavendiya Sarvaanga Thaganapali.
15 niththamum Idappadum Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyum Adhin Paanapaliyum Andri, Paavanivaarana Paliyaagak Karththarukku Oru Vellaattukkadaavum Seluththappadavendum.
16 mudhalaam Maadham Padhinaalaam Thedhi Karththarukku Uriya Paskaa.
17 andha Maadham Padhinaindhaam Thedhi Pandigainaal; Ezhunaalalavum Pulippillaadha Appam Pusikkavendum.
18 mudhalaam Naalile Parisuththa Sabai Koodudhal Irukkavendum; Andraiththinam Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyalaagaadhu.
19 appozhudhu Neengal Karththarukku Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Irandu Kaalaigalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Ezhu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,
20 avaigalukketra Pojanapaliyaaga Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavile Kaalaikkaagap Paththil Moondru Pangaiyum, Aattukkadaavukkaagap Paththil Irandu Pangaiyum,
21 ezhu Aattukkuttigalil Ovvondrirkaagap Paththil Oru Pangaiyum,
22 ungal Paavanivarththikkendru Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
23 kaalaiyile Niththamum Seluththum Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Andri Ivaigalaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.

24 indhappragaaram Ezhunaalalavum Naadorum Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapali Seluththakkadaveergal; Niththamum Seluththappadum Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Adhin Paanapaliyaiyum Andri, Idhaiyum Seluththavendum.
25 ezhaam Naalile Parisuththa Sabaikoodudhal Irukkavendum; Adhil Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyalaagaadhu.

26 andha Vaarangalukkuppin Neengal Karththarukkup Pudhiya Pojanapaliyaaga Mudharkanigalai Seluththum Pandigai Naalilum Parisuththa Sabaikoodudhal Irukkavendum; Adhil Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyalaagaadhu.
27 appozhudhu Neengal Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Irandu Kaalaigalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Ezhu Aattukkuttigalaiyum.
28 avaigalin Pojanapaliyaaga Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavil Oru Kaalaikkaagap Paththil Moondru Pangaiyum, Andha Oru Aattukkadaavukkaagap Paththil Irandu Pangaiyum,
29 ezhu Aattukkuttigalil Ovvondrirkaagap Paththil Oru Pangaiyum,
30 ungalukkaagap Paavanivarththi Seyyumpadikku Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
31 niththiya Sarvaanga Thagana Paliyaiyum Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum Adhin Paanapaliyaiyum Andri, Ivaigalaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal; Ivaigal Pazhudhatravaigalaayirukkavendum.
